page.title: 11 MR NOAKES
page.content: MR.Noakes was born in 1904.When he was 5 or 6 he learnt to make models.When he was older he was an artists apprentice and always looked up to a man called Sir William Orpin.He then went to Cambridge University where he started to get interested in religion,later he became a Clergyman at Chelmsford Cathedral and other places.MR.Noakes lives in Willows Green in a farmhouse,he has 6 old barns which he uses as workshops. When he retired he took up portrait painting and model making again.He loves making model houses,planes and figures.He had an exhibition in Braintree. He uses balsa wood,lime wood and even fire wood. The planes have a special nylon for the fuselage. He sometimes fits engines to the planes and operates them by remote control.
